meanings.definition: The quality or state of being prohibitive.
meanings.sent1: The prohibitiveness of the price made it impossible for many to afford.
meanings.sent2: The prohibitiveness of the rules discouraged new participants.
meanings.sent3: The prohibitiveness of the dress code led to some creative fashion choices.
meanings.sent4: The prohibitiveness of the mountain's height made it seem unconquerable.
meanings.sent5: The prohibitiveness of the security measures made the event feel exclusive.

meanings.definition: The act of prohibiting or forbidding something.
meanings.sent1: The prohibitiveness of the law surprised many citizens.
meanings.sent2: The prohibitiveness of the ban caused uproar among the community.
meanings.sent3: The prohibitiveness of the curfew led to some interesting late-night activities.
meanings.sent4: The prohibitiveness of the sign made it stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The prohibitiveness of the decision left everyone in disbelief.
